issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Hi,
my App uses a database which is profiled in my resource directory.

If I run on IOS or Android 4.4.2 everything is fine and i can use the database

on Android 7.1.1 a nEXUS device it is impossible to install the profiled database. I can only create and fill the tables by sql statements
fields.summary: Not able to use prefilled database on Android 5.1.1

comments.body: Hello [~mollin], Please attach a test case so we can reproduce the issue according to your environment. Thanks.
